column1: Smoque BBQ////My mouth waters just thinking about Smoque...best bbq in the city. The pulled pork is amazing
column2: and the mac & cheese is to die for.  We've been coming here since they opened a few years back
column3: and every meal has been amazing.  The service is always great
column4: and the owner is usually around talking to customers.  It's pretty busy now that everyone knows about this place
column5: so the wait is typically an hour
column6: even for carryout.  But the food is definately worth the wait! Yum!!!
